document_data.caption: A map of the Cities of the Pantheon showing Al-Hadi river in the south.
document_data.name: Al-Hadi River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Hadi River''', also called the '''River of Inspiration''', was a small winding river found in the northern region of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] in [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: Al-Hadi River originated in [[Al-Sayaj Mountains]]. It flowed west down from the mountains before emptying into the southern reaches of the [[Golden Gulf]] at the site of [[I'tiraf]].
